text.name: Shield Wand
text.description:
{Shield Wand}

Adds Shield Wand spell to spellbook. Use it to cast Shield spell for free.
text.event: On your way you stumble upon a small patch of terrain reminiscent of some hardened crust. In the middle of this place you see a wand, clearly emanating a magical power, stuck in the ground. You decide to grab the wand from the hardened soil and keep it for yourself.
